page.title: 07What parents do at work
page.content: Since our area is so rural the majority of people have to travel to work. Pinvin and Peopleton are partly dormitory villages for Worcester and Pershore since many people travel to these places for work. In the past, market gardening has provided many jobs for the people of this area, but with modern machinery this type of agriculture employs fewer people today. In a survey we conducted around our school the majority of parents seem to occupy{non-manual or professional jobs {outside of the village}in which they live. Although{unemployment}is high in Britain at the moment, job centre figures indicate that our area has below the national average out of work.
